0011011000101101 1001010000111101 0 -> sum: 1100101001101010, cout: 0
0101010011101010 1100010100100101 0 -> sum: 0001101000001111, cout: 1

0101110011010100 1010110101101011 1 -> sum: 0000101001000000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
